HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: given app name to the heroku app

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: get a Heroku API key from http://dashboard.heroku.com/account

CUSTOM_PLUGINS_REPO.description: Copy your repo link and use it as value of above var

ASSERT_SINGLE_INSTANCE.description: This will assert that there is only one running Userge instance to prevent from AUTH_KEY_DUPLICATED error

WORKERS.description: Set the number of workers count you want

RSS_CHAT_ID.description: Telegram chat id for post updates of rss feeds if you have added feed urls

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Go to console.developers.google.com to get it

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Go to console.developers.google.com to get it

G_DRIVE_IS_TD.description: If you are using Team Drive (TD) then set this value as True

G_DRIVE_INDEX_LINK.description: Just fill your url eg. https://example.example.workers.dev

DOWN_PATH.description: directory of your downloads folder, default is downloads

PREFERRED_LANGUAGE.description: Select your Preferred language. For example: If English value will be en

CURRENCY_API.description: Go to free.currencyconverterapi.com to get it

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Go to http://eepurl.com/bOLOcf to get it

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Add Default city value for weather details, eg. Delhi, India

SPAM_WATCH_API.description: Get SpamWatch API from @SpamWatch on Telegram

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Go to www.remove.bg/api to get it

G_DRIVE_PARENT_ID.description: enter the Folder Id of Google Drive

CMD_TRIGGER.description: Command Trigger needed to trigger your userbot to execute your command eg. . , !

SUDO_TRIGGER.description: Must be different from CMD_TRIGGER eg. $

FINISHED_PROGRESS_STR.description: You must fill Single text of filled bar line of character which can be shown in Finish bar https://coolsymbol.com/ https://changaco.oy.lc/unicode-progress-bars/ https://text-symbols.com/

CUSTOM_PACK_NAME.description: Mention any custom name default is @username as Sticker Pack Name

ALIVE_MEDIA.description: You can set your own custom media for .alive command

MAX_DURATION.description: Custome max audio(music) duration for voice call plugin Default to 900 seconds
